post.summary: Used to get activity which are marked as Idea For Better Indore

parameters.name: APPVERSION
parameters.description: API Version, Current value is v3.

parameters.name: LoginSessionKey
parameters.description: The Login Session Key of logged in user.

EntityGUID.description: Entity GUID, it may be User/Quiz GUID

FeedSortBy.description: Activity Sort Order, 1 for Recent Updated, 2 for Recent Post, 3 for popular, 4 for bookmark

AllActivity.description: used to fetch feed or wall, 0 for wall, 1 for newsfeed

IsMediaExists.description: Used to show only media(1) or only text(0), or both(2)

FeedUser.description: Used to show only particular user feed

StartDate.description: Start Date, show feed which are created on & after this date

EndDate.description: End Date, show feed which are created on & before this date

ActivityFilterType.description: Different type of filter like 0- for all, 11 - for Feature, 1 for user specific bookmark, 12 for all user bookmark

AsOwner.description: It is used in case of page wall, to filter all the post which are created as a Page, 0 -for all, 1 -for page created post

Mentions.description: Mentions, Used to filter only those post, in which given user/group are tagged

ViewEntityTags.description: Used to get activity tag or not, 1 -for Yes, 0 -for No

Tags.description: Filter feed based on some existing post tags

ModuleEntityGUID.description: Module Entity GUID, it may be User/Quiz GUID

Visibility.description: Post privacy, 1 for Everyone, 3 Friend, 3 Only me

AllActivity.description: Created from wall/newsfeed, 0 for wall, 1 for newsfeed

NotifyAll.description: Used to notify all member if post made on group wall, 1 -Notify all, 0 -Not Notify

ActivityGUID.description: Activity GUID, in case of edit

Summary.description: Post Summary, it is used in case of article

PostAsModuleID.description: Post Creator module ID, it may be 3(User), Page(18)

Status.description: Post Status, is it draft post or not, 10 -For draft post, 2 -For active post

PollOptions.description: Poll Options, array of poll options, only two option allowed

DeleteLink.description: 0 or 1, if 1 then delete existing link preview

IsCityNews.description: City news or not 0 - No, 1 - Yes

IsShowOnNewsFeed.description: Show it on news feed or not, 0 - Yes, 1 - No

EntityGUID.description: Entity GUID, which is being like/unlike

EntityType.description: EntityType, it may be ACTIVITY, ALBUM, COMMENT

EntityGUID.description: Entity GUID, which is being like/unlike

EntityType.description: EntityType, it may be ACTIVITY, ALBUM, COMMENT

EntityGUID.description: Entity GUID, which is being viewed

EntityType.description: EntityType, it may be ACTIVITY, MEDIA

ParentCommentGUID.description: Parent Comment GUID, used in case of reply

DeleteLink.description: 0 or 1, if 1 then delete existing link preview

ModuleEntityID.description: Module Entity ID, it may be User/Group/Page/Event ID

Filter.description: it may be, Recent, Popular, Network

ModuleEntityGUID.description: Module Entity GUID, it may be User/Quiz GUID

FeedSortBy.description: Activity Sort Order, 1 for Recent Updated, 2 for Recent Post, 3 for popular, 4 for bookmark

ViewEntityTags.description: Used to get activity tag or not, 1 -for Yes, 0 -for No
Used to get activity tag or not, 1 -for Yes, 0 -for No
